questions: Do you keep monthly records of revenue and expenses?
Do you have access to any form of credit?
Can you cover business expenses for 3+ months without new income?
Do you have more than one supplier for critical inputs?
Do you have standard procedures for daily operations?
Do you have staff trained to cover roles if someone is absent?
Is your customer base diversified (no one customer >30%)?
Are your products/services in stable demand?
Have you changed prices or product mix in the past 6 months?
Have inflation/FX changes disrupted your business in past year?
Is your main fuel/power source stable and affordable?
Do you use digital tools (e.g., mobile money, spreadsheets, apps)?
Do you track customer or sales data?
Are you able to conduct any business online (e.g., social media, WhatsApp)?
